nodes.description: The terrorist bombing which targeted the airport on Monday left 35 dead and 130 with injures of varying severity.
nodes.support_text: The terrorist bombing which targeted the airport on Monday left 35 dead and 130 with injures of varying severity.

nodes.description: Syria strongly condemns the terrorist bombing that took place in Domodedovo Airport near Moscow.
nodes.support_text: Syria strongly condemns the terrorist bombing that took place in Domodedovo Airport near Moscow.

nodes.description: Syria affirms its full support to Russia in confronting and combating terrorism.
nodes.support_text: Syria affirms to the government and people of the friendly Russian Federation Syria's full support in confronting and combating terrorism, expressing the deepest regret over the loss of innocent lives.
